p: After 60 days of treatment, the rats from the HFD and HFD + APNO groups were weighed and allocated individually to metabolic cages for 24 h for individual evaluation of food and water intake, and urine and feces excretion. At the same time, the anal temperature of the rats was determined with the aid of a digital thermometer (TS-101, Techline, Changchun, China) to evaluate the thermogenic effect of the APNO.
